authorCredential.translatedString: Political Animal, Physician, Goofball, and All Around Nerd.
authorCredential.experience: Political Animal, Physician, Goofball, and All Around Nerd.

question.title: {"sections": [{"spans": [{"text": "As a liberal, have you ever been criticized for not being far enough left?", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}]}

credentials.translatedString: lives in The United States of America (1900-present)
lives in The United States of America (2000-present)

answer.content: {"sections": [{"spans": [{"text": "All the time.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "I\u2019m pretty solidly left of center. But when I talk to some other liberals, I feel like I\u2019m center-left.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "I didn\u2019t vote for Hillary Clinton in my primary, but I don\u2019t believe she\u2019s all that corrupt or conservative. She\u2019s got two issues where she\u2019s to the right of the Democratic electorate: foreign policy and her proximity to Big Finance. That\u2019s it. I don\u2019t think she was Voldemort. What\u2019s more, her proposals were actually more realistic than Bernie\u2019s, from both a mathematical and political standpoint.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "ordered-list", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "I don\u2019t think the entire Trump phenomenon can be ascribed to racism.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "ordered-list", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "I don\u2019t think a single-payer system by itself would fix our healthcare system. We need to identify specific and politically realistic mechanisms by which spending will be cut. Bernie\u2019s current proposal is more of a statement of political philosophy than a bill that can actually achieve anything. The technocrat in me really doesn\u2019t like that.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "ordered-list", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "Affirmative action makes me really uncomfortable. I would prefer that it be changed into a program that took socioeconomic status rather than race as a primary factor.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "ordered-list", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "Like Franklin Veaux, I also don\u2019t think GMOs are poison.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "ordered-list", "is_rtl": false}]}
